DOC.brief_summary: This research protocol compare Theramine non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug ( NSAID ) treatment chronic back pain . The study examine efficacy tolerability Theramine alone patient chronic back pain comparison NSAID , Naproxen , co-administration Naproxen Theramine .
DOC.detailed_description: After inform consent screening , volunteer enter double blind , randomize , three-armed trial , 40 patient group . Patients receive either Naproxen 250 mg daily , Theramine 2 capsule two time daily , co-administration low-dose Naproxen 250 mg daily Theramine 2 capsule two time daily 28 day .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Back pain lasting great six week . Pain must present least 5 7 day two week prior screen visit 2 . Analgesic medication use treat pain least 4 last 7 day least 10 day last month 3 . Men nonpregnant , nonlactating woman age 18 age 75 , able read , understand sign Englishlanguage inform consent , diagnosis back pain baseline back pain great 40 mm 100 mm visual analog scale 4 . Those take NSAID pain must discontinue use washout period base attached five ( 5 ) halflives drug chart 5 . If undergoing physical therapy back pain , therapy must stable least three week prior study remain throughout study 6 . If use psychoactive medication might analgesic effect , ( i.e . antidepressant anticonvulsant ) , treatment must stable least three month prior study 7 . For men woman childbearing potential , must willing use adequate contraception pregnant impregnate partner entire time study 8 . Must willing commit clinical visit studyrelated procedure , include require discontinuation ( washout ) analgesic antiinflammatory medication prior Day 1 randomization . The patient must agree use acetaminophen rescue medication 1 . Patients back surgery past six month 2 . Patients significant neurologic impairment , diagnose screen physical examination 3 . Patients evidence history fracture spine past year 4 . Patients fluent English 5 . Use aspirin nonarthritic condition , unless dose less equal 325 mg day , must stable least one month prior screen 6 . Use controlled substance and/or opiate analgesic pain , 5 day within last 30 day prior screen visit 7 . Receipt oral intramuscular softtissue injection corticosteroid within one month prior screen 8 . Participation clinical trial within one month prior screen 9 . History epidural past 3 month 10 . History alcohol substance abuse 11 . Uncontrolled unstable serious cardiovascular , pulmonary , gastrointestinal urogenital , endocrine , neurologic psychiatric disorder 12 . History gastrointestinal bleed document gastric duodenal ulcer
